thumb.title: Poor Lamb [original song, Vocaloid, Taku/Jessica]
thumb.description: The song's about a fool, ambling through life, without any sense of worth or, eek, responsibility. Tech Notes Sonic control (sounds glamorous?) -- from stock Cubase frequency 2 plug-in and Black Valve compression (side-chained on the bass from the drums). Numerous subtle delays & reverbs and a nod to the ModMachine for kick-drum accents that go boing. Drums are Halion and Backbone combined. Bass sounds from Halion too, with added Reason Bass and Cello. Synths abound: including Halion World Instruments (the chiffy bottle), Padshop, Retrologue, UAD PolyMAX, Full Bucket's Oxid. Vocal synths are courtesy of Vocaloid 6's Taku & Jessica.
